question: My husband has Cardiomyopathy & Diabetes.  He's on meds for both--heart meds & Metformin.  He sweats ALOT when he sleeps & his side of the bed (the sheets & pillows) smell like raw meat (beef).  Would it more likely be the illness(es) or the meds that cause this odor?
title: Wierd ODOR to sweat...
